title: Making Plans: Scheduling (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Scheduling subcategory within Making Plans. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Is Friday night alright with you?
cards.romaji: Kin-yobi no yoru wa daijobu desu ka.
cards.japanese: 金曜日の夜は大丈夫ですか。
